ExpSyntax.val: IF({0,95}='' OR ISNULL({0,95}),'',' AND Concat(FirstName,IIF(MiddleName = '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(39)&' or middleName is null,'&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(39)&',Concat('&ASCIIChr(39)&' '&ASCIIChr(39)&',MiddleName)),IIF(LastName = '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(39)&' or LastName is null,'&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(39)&',Concat('&ASCIIChr(39)&' '&ASCIIChr(39)&',LastName))) LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(37)&Trim({0,95})&ASCIIChr(37)&ASCIIChr(39)&' ')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select Code, Concat(FirstName,IIF(MiddleName = '' or middleName is null,'',Concat(' ',MiddleName)),IIF(LastName = '' or LastName is null,'',Concat(' ',LastName))) FullName, BirthDate, IIF(Sex='F','Female',IIF(Sex='M','Male','Not Specified')) 'Sex', IIF(martStatus='S','Single',iif(martStatus='M','Married',IIF(martStatus='W','Widowed',IIF(martstatus='D','Divorced','Not Specified')))) 'MartStatus', BplId, Dept, Mobile, Email, StartDate, EmpId, IIF(Active='Y','Active','Inactive') 'Active' from OHEM (NOLOCK) where (Code = ':1' or ':1' is null or ':1' = '') :2 :3

ExpSyntax.val: IF({0,95}='' OR ISNULL({0,95}),'',' AND Concat(FirstName,IIF(MiddleName = '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(39)&' or middleName is null,'&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(39)&',Concat('&ASCIIChr(39)&' '&ASCIIChr(39)&',MiddleName)),IIF(LastName = '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(39)&' or LastName is null,'&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(39)&',Concat('&ASCIIChr(39)&' '&ASCIIChr(39)&',LastName))) LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(37)&Trim({0,95})&ASCIIChr(37)&ASCIIChr(39)&' ')
